Source.Name: f2fs-tools
Source.Summary: Userland tools for the f2fs filesystem
Source.Description: f2fs-tools are a collection of tools for Flash-Friendly File System (F2FS). It allows to format, mount, check and doing other operations on F2FS partitions.

Package.Name: f2fs-tools
Package.Summary: Userland tools for the f2fs filesystem
Package.Description: f2fs-tools are a collection of tools for Flash-Friendly File System (F2FS). It allows to format, mount, check and doing other operations on F2FS partitions.
